title: What mid champs to use in ranked
body: I mostly main champs like Syndra and Viktor but I am considering buying Orianna to use in ranked. So should i stay with my main mids or go with Orianna?

replies.body: go with what you are good at, no point getting a new champ just because its popular, she is actually pretty hard to play well. and loses some match ups that are really common atm.

> [{quoted}](name=Pringles360,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=YBKtLZHq,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-01-13T01:26:35.421+0000)
>
> I mostly main champs like Syndra and Viktor but I am considering buying Orianna to use in ranked. So should i stay with my main mids or go with Orianna?

Just master Syndra, she's an incredible mid  that fits with nearly any team comp.

No harm in expanding your champion pool. Ever. Buy her. Try her. If you like her learn her, otherwise no harm no foul.

I recently bought a lot of champs and so far of the 5 i've bought I only actually think I will play 1 in ranked.

Hey man,

In my opinion if you're going to play Ranked, then stick to the champs that you main and are confident with. If you want to buy Orianna and test her out, play with her in Normals first, then if you feel comfortable with her, take it to Ranked. It's not worth the stress of losing LP playing a champ that you aren't confident with in Ranked. But, like I said, it's just my opinion =) comes down to your decision.

Hope I helped a bit.

Why not both? It is always good to have 3-4 champs for each role so you can counter pick and contribute to a strong team comp. 

{{champion:112}}  is an op sleeper champ and everyone underestimates his damage. 
{{champion:134}}  provides critical 5man cc in team fights and counters many midlaners.
{{champion:61}}  provides a strong initiation (if you can land it) as well as being a safe mid lane pick.
